name.description: The project's name as it should appear in lists, cards, etc.

projectUrl.description: Best URL to use when linking to the project in general (e.g., if making `name` a link to the project). May be a full URL, or may be relative to the Nivenly website.

logoUrl.description: Best URL to use as the project's logo.

description.description: Long form project description. May contain multiple paragraphs. Will be passed through the `markdownify` filter before use, so can contain Markdown markup.

callToAction.description: Short text to use as the call to action for this project
